metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000654 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: GNU Libtasn1-4.13 libtasn1-4.13 version libtasn1-4.13, libtasn1-4.12 contains a DoS, specifically CPU usage will reach 100% when running asn1Paser against the POC due to an issue in _asn1_expand_object_id(p_tree), after a long time, the program will be killed. This attack appears to be exploitable via parsing a crafted file.

notes.note: mdeslaur> only an issue during at build time, not at runtime. As such, marking as negigible leosilva> no upstream fix as of 2018-10-09

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2018-10-09').
